definition: to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)
reconstruction loan provided by Great Powers to Yuan Shikai in 1913

sentences.english: He mortgaged his house in order to start a business.
sentences.chinese: 他将房子作抵押借款以开办一家商店。

sentences.english: On the influence of old new accounting postulates to borrowing costs capitalization.
sentences.chinese: 阐述新旧会计准则对借款费用资本化的影响。

sentences.english: If the loan contract is not in operation, insurance agen…
sentences.chinese: 借款合同尚未生效，保险人不应当承担保险责任。

sentences.english: Atcheson's company and its competitors screen the driving records of prospective borrowers.
sentences.chinese: 艾奇逊的公司和屏幕准借款人的驾驶记录其竞争对手。

sentences.english: The borrower shall pay interest on each interest payment day.
sentences.chinese: 借款人须于每一付息日当日付息。

sentences.english: It does not involve just borrowing money and repaying the principal with interest.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅涉及到借款和付还本息。

sentences.english: Wang bing want to loan contract to purloin it grounds.
sentences.chinese: 王兵想以借款合同为由据为己有。

sentences.english: I sometimes find it a strain to be responsible for the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 我有时发现偿还抵押借款是个负担。

sentences.english: Interest expense incurred as a result of borrowing from financial institutions or other persons.
sentences.chinese: 凡向金融机构或他人借款等所发生之利息费用皆属之。

sentences.english: That means the government and businesses here will pay more to borrow money.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着，这里的政府和公司要付更多的钱借款。

sentences.english: That plus cheap money encourages consumers to leverage their own balance sheets.
sentences.chinese: 还有低利借款鼓励消费者撬动他们自己的资产负债表。

sentences.english: These are longer in term and accrued interest for the borrower.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是在较长的任期应计利息的借款。

sentences.english: Article 205 The borrower shall pay the interest at the prescribed time.
sentences.chinese: 第二百零五条借款人应当按照约定的期限支付利息。

sentences.english: The calculation of damages is same as the said penalties collected from the borrower.
sentences.chinese: 违约金数额的计算应与加收借款方的罚息计算相同。

sentences.english: Contacting another financial institution to loan funds, then taking the measures under subparagraph 1.
sentences.chinese: 先洽其他金融机构商借款项，再依第一款规定处理。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
